verses.translation: (1) By the fig and the olive[1947]

verses.arabic_text: لَقَدۡ خَلَقۡنَا ٱلۡإِنسَٰنَ فِيٓ أَحۡسَنِ تَقۡوِيمٖ
verses.translation: (4) We have certainly created man in the best of stature;[1948]
(5) Then We return him to the lowest of the low,[1949]

verses.arabic_text: إِلَّا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ فَلَهُمۡ أَجۡرٌ غَيۡرُ مَمۡنُونٖ
verses.translation: (6) Except for those who believe and do righteous deeds, for they will have a reward uninterrupted.
(7) So what yet causes you to deny the Recompense?[1950]
(8) Is not Allāh the most just of judges?
